The trial of James 'Whitey' Bulger

Weeks testifies against his former mentor

Kevin Weeks, the loyal tough guy whom James “Whitey” Bulger groomed as his successor, described in vivid detail today in US District Court in Boston how he first assisted Bulger in a murder. (12:48 p.m.)
  • Live Blog Recap of today's testimony  |  Profile Kevin Weeks
  • Key players at the Bulger trial  |  More Whitey Bulger coverage

Heinz Kerry listed in 'fair condition' at MGH

The health of Secretary of State John Kerry's wife Teresa Heinz Kerry has improved after arriving at Massachusetts General Hospital from Nantucket yesterday. (1:07 p.m.)
  • AP source: Heinz Kerry showed symptoms of seizure

Hernandez associate due in court today

Ernest Wallace, who is accused of helping former Patriot Aaron Hernandez after Odin Lloyd's murder, is expected to appear in court this afternoon. (12:19 p.m.)
  • Follow our live updates
  • 6/29 Wallace denied bond

Asiana pilot lacked experience

The pilot was guiding Asiana's Boeing 777 plane into San Francisco's airport for the first time and failed to abort the landing after coming in too slowly to set down safely, officials said.

NewportFILM takes it outside

NewportFILM kicks off its popular outdoors film screenings July 11, events that are mostly picnic-style, BYOB affairs with live music, food vendors, bike valet and often a filmmaker to hold a Q&A after the event.
